channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-2996] iepnegativetests_ES.diff fails with J2ME Foundation
item.description:
• Diff file derbyall/i18nTest/iepnegativetests_ES.diff

item.environment:
windows 2000
Java Version: J2ME Foundation Specification v1.1

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Attaching a patch to resolve this issue.
Please test this patch before commit.

Thanks
Ramin Moazeni

Although the published results http://people.apache.org/~fuzzylogic/derby_test_results/main/index.html appear to have some problems, it does show that on Aug 9 - before the patch was checked in - the test still failed, but on August 10, it no longer failed.

So, closing this issue.
